name: Whiskey Sour
build: put all ingredients in shaker and dry shake
add ice and shake again
double strain into chilled glass
wait 30 sec for drink to settle
place drops of angostura bitters on the foamy top
run garnish pick through bitters drops to make hearts

name: Saskahattan
build: combine ingredients in mixing glass
add ice and stir still chilled and diluted
Strain into rocks glass with large rock, or serve up
garnish with cocktail cherry

name: New York
build: combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake
double string into rocks glass over ice
cut orange swatch and express over the drink
garnish with the orange swath

name: Obstruction no 1
build: combine ingredients in mixing glass
add ice and stir till chilled and diluted
Strain into rocks glass with large rock
smoke that bad boy, if you can

name: Paper Plane
recipe: .75 oz Aperol (substitute with Campari to make a Paper Airplane)
build: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake
double strain into a chilled coup
express lemon oil on top and wipe rim of glass
garnish with your lemon swath if you feel so inclined

name: Yellow no 5
build: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake
double strain into a chilled coup
express lemon oil on top and wipe rim of glass
garnish with your lemon swath if you feel so inclined

name: Mai Tai
build: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake
double strain into a glass with pebble or crushed ice
garnish with sprig of mint
optional, float some dark rum on top
extra optional, take lime half that was squeezed, float on top of drink, fill with 151 and light that bitch

name: Last Word
build: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake
double strain into a chilled coup
